quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn’t take.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.quote: Life becomes easier when you accept the apology you never got.
quotes.author: R. Brault

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

quotes.quote: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The road to success is always under construction.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation and hard work.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Knowing when to be silent is wisdom.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The simple things are also the most extraordinary things.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The fool wonders, the wise man asks.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Where there is love, there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Love recognizes no barriers.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Love cures people—both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
quotes.author: Karl A. Menninger

quotes.quote: Where there is love, there is no darkness.
quotes.author: Burundian Proverb

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Fortune favors the bold.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence every time you stop to look fear in the face.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Leap, and the net will appear.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Do the thing you fear, and the death of fear is certain.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Courage starts with showing up and letting ourselves be seen.
quotes.author: Brené Brown

quotes.quote: He who is brave is free.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Fear is a reaction. Courage is a decision.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The greatest leader is the one who gets people to do the greatest things.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: A genuine leader is not a searcher for consensus but a molder of consensus.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: A leader is a dealer in hope.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It is about taking care of those in your charge.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader
